channel.title: Innovative Artists on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Innovative Artists on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Innovative Artists Gets Into Sports Representation
item.description: Veteran entertainment and sports lawyer Brad Small most recently was a partner at Fox Rothschild LLP, with a focus on representing pro TV wrestlers like Chris Jericho, Goldberg and Jack Perry.
